description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤的第四子，母亲为孝明王皇后。其三叔宋太宗继位后，他被封为兴元尹，但英年早逝，死因被广泛认为与宋太宗有关。其后代包括宋孝宗、宋光宗、宋宁宗。在《包公案》、《杨家将》等文学作品中，他常被误认为是“八贤王”的原型。
description.en: The fourth son of Emperor Taizu of Song (Zhao Kuangyin), his mother was Empress Xiaoming. After his third uncle, Emperor Taizong, ascended the throne, he was appointed Governor of Xingyuan but died young. His death is widely believed to be related to Emperor Taizong. His descendants include Emperor Xiaozong, Emperor Guangzong, and Emperor Ningzong. In literary works like "Case Files of Bao Gong" and "Generals of the Yang Family," he is often mistaken as the prototype for the "Eighth Virtuous Prince".

description.zh-cn: 宋朝开国皇帝，史称宋太祖。他是赵德芳与赵德昭的父亲，宋太宗的兄长。其驾崩与“烛影斧声”疑案有关。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Song dynasty, known historically as Emperor Taizu of Song. He was the father of Zhao Defang and Zhao Dezhao, and the elder brother of Emperor Taizong. His death is associated with the historical mystery of the "candlelight and axe shadow".

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤的皇后，赵德芳的生母。
description.en: An empress of Emperor Taizu of Song and the biological mother of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。其继位涉及“烛影斧声”疑案，被广泛怀疑谋杀兄长篡位，并与侄子赵德昭、赵德芳的早逝有关。
description.en: The second emperor of the Song dynasty, the younger brother of Emperor Taizu of Song (Zhao Kuangyin). His accession to the throne is mired in the "candlelight and axe shadow" mystery, leading to widespread suspicion that he murdered his brother to usurp the throne, and was also involved in the early deaths of his nephews Zhao Dezhao and Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤之子，赵德芳的异母兄。在宋太宗时期被迫自杀。
description.en: A son of Emperor Taizu of Song and the half-brother of Zhao Defang. He was forced to commit suicide during the reign of Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖的皇后。太祖驾崩时，她试图传位给赵德芳，但未成功。
description.en: An empress of Emperor Taizu of Song. When the emperor died, she attempted to have Zhao Defang succeed the throne, but was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝内侍。宋太祖驾崩后，他未遵从宋皇后传召赵德芳的命令，而是将遗诏交给了晋王赵光义，助其继位。
description.en: A palace eunuch of the Song dynasty. After Emperor Taizu's death, he disobeyed Empress Song's order to summon Zhao Defang and instead brought the edict to Prince of Jin (Zhao Guangyi), helping him ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 指宋太祖赵匡胤突然驾崩、其弟赵光义（后来的宋太宗）随之即位的历史疑案。该事件使宋太宗的继位合法性备受质疑，后世多怀疑他弑兄篡位。
description.en: Refers to the historical mystery surrounding the sudden death of Emperor Taizu of Song and the immediate succession of his brother Zhao Guangyi (later Emperor Taizong). This event cast doubt on the legitimacy of Emperor Taizong's succession, with many later historians suspecting he committed fratricide to usurp the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第三位皇帝，宋太宗之子，赵德芳的堂兄。
description.en: The third emperor of the Song dynasty, son of Emperor Taizong and cousin of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第二位皇帝，赵德芳的六世孙。
description.en: The second emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, and a sixth-generation descendant of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第三位皇帝，赵德芳的七世孙。
description.en: The third emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, and a seventh-generation descendant of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 南宋第四位皇帝，赵德芳的八世孙。
description.en: The fourth emperor of the Southern Song dynasty, and an eighth-generation descendant of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 北宋第八位皇帝。他将赵德芳的追封爵位由楚王改为秦王。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Northern Song dynasty. He changed Zhao Defang's posthumous title from Prince of Chu to Prince of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳之妻，焦继勋之女，是赵惟叙和赵惟宪的生母。
description.en: Wife of Zhao Defang and daughter of Jiao Jixun. She was the biological mother of Zhao Weixu and Zhao Weixian.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳之妻，符彦卿孙女，是赵惟能的生母。
description.en: Wife of Zhao Defang and granddaughter of Fu Yanqing. She was the biological mother of Zhao Weineng.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳之妻。
description.en: Wife of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳之妻。
description.en: Wife of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳长子，母亲是焦氏。官至怀州防御使，封高平郡公。
description.en: The eldest son of Zhao Defang and Lady Jiao. He served as the Defense Commissioner of Huaizhou and was ennobled as Duke of Gaoping Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳次子，母亲是焦氏。官至节度使兼侍中，封英国公。他是宋孝宗、宋光宗、宋宁宗的直系祖先。
description.en: The second son of Zhao Defang and Lady Jiao. He held the positions of Military Governor (Jiedushi) and Palace Attendant (Shizhong), and was ennobled as Duke of Ying. He is a direct ancestor of Emperors Xiaozong, Guangzong, and Ningzong.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳三子，母亲是卫国夫人符氏。官至蔡州防御使，封南康郡公。
description.en: The third son of Zhao Defang and Lady Fu of Wei State. He served as the Defense Commissioner of Caizhou and was ennobled as Duke of Nankang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳之女，嫁给了崔从湜。
description.en: The daughter of Zhao Defang, married to Cui Congshi.

description.zh-cn: 西京左藏库副使，娶赵德芳之女永寿县主为妻。
description.en: Deputy Commissioner of the Western Capital Left Treasury, married to Yongshou County Princess, the daughter of Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 宋太宗第八子，时人称之为“八大王”。他被认为是文学与民间传说中“八贤王”形象的真实原型，而这一虚构角色常被误与赵德芳联系起来。
description.en: The eighth son of Emperor Taizong, known by his contemporaries as the "Eighth Great Prince." He is considered the true prototype for the "Eighth Virtuous Prince" in literature and folklore, a fictional character often mistakenly associated with Zhao Defang.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝地方行政区划，为“道”一级。
description.en: A circuit-level administrative division in the Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代职官名，在唐、宋时期为宰相职务的名称之一。
description.en: An official title in ancient China, serving as one of the titles for the Grand Chancellor during the Tang and Song dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代职官名，为三公之一，通常主管全国军事。
description.en: An official title in ancient China, one of the Three Excellencies, typically in charge of the nation's military affairs.

description.zh-cn: 焦氏是赵惟叙和赵惟宪的生母。
description.en: Lady Jiao was the biological mother of Zhao Weixu and Zhao Weixian.

description.zh-cn: 焦氏是赵惟叙和赵惟宪的生母。
description.en: Lady Jiao was the biological mother of Zhao Weixu and Zhao Weixian.

description.zh-cn: 卫国夫人符氏是赵惟能的生母。
description.en: Lady Fu of Wei State was the biological mother of Zhao Weineng.

description.zh-cn: 赵元俨是宋太宗第八子。
description.en: Zhao Yuanyan was the eighth son of Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳与赵德昭为异母兄弟。
description.en: Zhao Defang and Zhao Dezhao were half-brothers.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳是宋真宗的堂兄。
description.en: Zhao Defang was the cousin of Emperor Zhenzong.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国六年（981年）赵德芳病死，年仅二十三岁。因其兄赵德昭此前亦离奇死亡，史学家多半认为赵德芳的死因与宋太宗有直接关系。
description.en: In 981, Zhao Defang died of illness at the young age of twenty-three. As his elder brother Zhao Dezhao had also died under mysterious circumstances earlier, most historians believe Zhao Defang's death was directly related to Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国四年（979年），赵德昭被宋太宗逼迫自杀。
description.en: In 979, Zhao Dezhao was forced to commit suicide by Emperor Taizong.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖驾崩时，宋皇后命王继恩召赵德芳入宫继位，但王继恩违命去找晋王赵光义，阻碍了赵德芳继位的可能性。
description.en: When Emperor Taizu died, Empress Song ordered Wang Ji'en to summon Zhao Defang to the palace to succeed the throne, but Wang Ji'en disobeyed and went to the Prince of Jin (Zhao Guangyi) instead, thereby blocking Zhao Defang's potential accession.

description.zh-cn: “烛影斧声”疑案的直接结果是宋太宗赵光义得以继承皇位。
description.en: The direct result of the "candlelight and axe shadow" incident was the accession of Zhao Guangyi, Emperor Taizong, to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖驾崩时，王继恩未遵从宋皇后召赵德芳的命令，而是拿着遗诏去找晋王赵光义，此举帮助赵光义成功继位。
description.en: When Emperor Taizu died, Wang Ji'en disobeyed Empress Song's order to summon Zhao Defang and instead took the edict to the Prince of Jin (Zhao Guangyi), an action that helped Zhao Guangyi successfully ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖驾崩时，宋皇后急令内侍王继恩召赵德芳入宫，试图拥立其为新皇帝。
description.en: When Emperor Taizu died, Empress Song urgently ordered the eunuch Wang Ji'en to summon Zhao Defang to the palace, in an attempt to enthrone him as the new emperor.

description.zh-cn: 宋徽宗时期，将赵德芳的追封爵位由楚王改为秦王。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Huizong, Zhao Defang's posthumous title was changed from Prince of Chu to Prince of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 赵元俨是“八贤王”这一文学形象的真实原型，但该形象在后世的评书、戏剧中常被误署名为赵德芳，导致了二者形象的混淆。
description.en: Zhao Yuanyan is the historical prototype for the literary figure of the "Eighth Virtuous Prince," but this character's name was often misattributed to Zhao Defang in later storytelling and drama, leading to a confusion of their personas.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国元年（976年），赵德芳被授予山南西道节度使。
description.en: In 976, Zhao Defang was appointed the Military Governor (Jiedushi) of Shannan West Circuit.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国元年（976年），赵德芳被授予同平章事，获得宰相之职。
description.en: In 976, Zhao Defang was granted the title of Tongpingzhangshi, effectively making him a Grand Chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国三年（978年）冬，赵德芳加检校太尉。
description.en: In the winter of 978, Zhao Defang was additionally appointed Inspecting Grand Marshal.
